name:
Sweet Dreams and
the Holy Grail
tabName: Sweet Dreams and the Holy Grail
introduction:
▌ After the event "Sweet Dreams and the Holy Grail" begins, Trailblazers can participate in Trailblaze Continuance and the collaboration event gameplay. The collaboration characters have no English voiceovers. You may switch to another voiceover language if preferred.

▌ Fate/Night in Dreamland
◆ Introduction ◆
● An omnipotent wish-granting chalice that can fulfill all dreams — the Holy Grail — has descended upon the planet of dream-chase.

▌ Fate/stay night
◆ Event Rules ◆
● In Fate/stay night, the Trailblazer will participate in the Holy Grail War alongside 7 simulated characters. After multiple 1v1 showdowns, a final victor will be decided.

▌ Fate Gift
● During the event, Trailblazers who consume a cumulative total of 200 Star Rail Special Passes across any Version 3.4 Warp event can claim the reward after the Collaboration Warp begins.
● The total number of "Star Rail Special Passes" consumed is shared across all Warp events in Version 3.4.
● This reward can only be claimed once during the event.

▌ Fate Contract
● During the event, all Trailblazers at Trailblaze Level 3 or above can immediately receive the limited collaboration 5-star character Archer after logging in.
